7001.name: Crypt Entrance
7001.description:
Stone steps descend into darkness. The air is cold and still,
carrying the musty scent of ancient death. Cobwebs hang thick
across the entrance, and strange symbols are carved into the 
archway. This is a place of the dead.

7002.name: The Antechamber
7002.description:
Dusty sarcophagi line the walls of this chamber. Most are sealed,
but a few lie broken open, their occupants long since risen. Faded
paintings on the walls depict a noble family. Corridors lead deeper
into the crypt.

7003.name: The Hall of Bones
7003.description:
The walls of this corridor are composed entirely of human bones -
skulls, femurs, and ribs arranged in macabre patterns. The floor
crunches underfoot with ancient fragments. An unholy chill permeates
this place.

7004.name: The Necromancer's Sanctum
7004.description:
You have found the lair of the Necromancer who plagues this land.
Dark altars hold blasphemous offerings, and arcane circles are
etched into the floor. Candles of black wax burn with an eerie 
green flame. The Necromancer himself awaits...

7010.name: The Noble's Tomb
7010.description:
An ornate tomb dominates this chamber. Once the resting place
of a noble lord, it has been desecrated by the undead plague.
The ghost of the lord still lingers, trapped between worlds.

7020.name: The Mass Grave
7020.description:
The floor of this chamber is uneven, covered with mounds of
earth beneath which countless bodies were interred during some
ancient plague. Now they rise again, clawing their way free.

7001.name: a skeleton warrior
7001.long_desc: A skeleton in rusted armor stands guard.

7002.name: a shambling zombie
7002.long_desc: A zombie lurches toward you, arms outstretched.

7003.name: a ghoul
7003.long_desc: A ghoul crouches over a corpse, feeding.

7004.name: Malachar the Necromancer
7004.long_desc: A robed figure channels dark energy, eyes glowing with malice.

7005.name: an undead knight
7005.long_desc: A knight in black armor stands motionless, awaiting command.

7006.name: the ghost of Lord Aldric
7006.long_desc: A spectral figure floats above its tomb, eyes filled with sorrow.

70.name: the Staff of the Dead
70.short_desc: a bone staff crackling with energy
70.room_desc: A staff made of fused bones pulses with dark power.

71.name: the Necronomicon
71.short_desc: a book bound in human skin
71.room_desc: A dark tome lies open, pages covered in forbidden knowledge.

72.name: Lord Aldric's blade
72.room_desc: A spectral sword hovers in the air.
